name: Save Your Mother
description: Alice Andersson, a world-renowned scholar, faces a dilemma of grand proportions when her mother falls gravely ill. No traditional cures have been able to save her; not even the most unconventional methods have worked! Join her as she discovers the legend about the Elohim Cube, a mystical artifact that might be their only hope.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8 .1 (32-bit/64-bit Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 640 x 480 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 330 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 8 .1 (32-bit/64-bit Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Storage: 350 MB available space
